channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: VR headsets are 'hope machines' inside California prisons
item.description: Prisoners are now taking regular trips to far-flung, exotic locales such as Thailand

item.title: Greenland's party leaders firmly reject Trump's push for US control of the island
item.description: Greenland’s party leaders have rejected President Donald Trump’s calls for the U.S. to take control of the island

item.title: How the US could take over Greenland and the potential challenges
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has repeatedly threatened Greenland and says Washington must take control of the strategically located island

item.title: A battered Cuba braces for aftershocks as US seizures of oil tankers linked to Venezuela surge
item.description: As U.S. seizures of oil tankers linked to Venezuela surge, so do concerns in Cuba about whether the island’s government and economy will survive

item.title: Protests against ICE planned across US after shootings in Minneapolis and Portland, Oregon
item.description: Protests against immigration enforcement have been planned across the country after federal officers shot three people in Minneapolis and Portland
